    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1251</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Haggadah Shel Pesach: The Fifth Son1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haggadah Shel Pesach: Das Fünfte Son1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Haggadah Shel Pesach : Le Cinquième Son1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hagadá Shel Pesach: O Quinto Son1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Haggadah Shel Pesach: Il Quinto Son1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Haggadah Shel Pesach: Πέμπτο Son1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haggadah Shel Pesach: El Quinto Son1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners delve into their Jewish identity and their relationship to the land of Israel through the study of the Haggadah.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Haggadah shel pesach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jewish identity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">land of Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger forschen in ihre jüdische Identität 
und in ihr Verhältnis zum Land von Israel durch die Studie des 
Haggadah.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants fouillent dans leur identité juive
et leur rapport avec la terre de l'Israel par l'étude du haggadah.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners delve em sua identidade jewish e em 
seu relacionamento à terra de Israel com o estudo do Hagadá.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti esaminano a fondo la loro identità
ebrea ed il loro rapporto alla terra dell'Israele con lo studio sul 
haggadah.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι ερευνούν στην εβραϊκή ταυτότητά τους και
τη σχέση τους στο έδαφος του Ισραήλ μέσω της μελέτης του 
Haggadah.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes cavan en su identidad judía y 
su lazo a la pista de Israel con el estudio del haggadah.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haggadah shel pesach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jüdische Identität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Land von Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pesach de shel de haggadah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Identité juive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">terre de l'Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesach do shel do Hagadá</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Identidade jewish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">terra de Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
